text: Ndipo ngati wina sangathe kutero, ayenera kusala chakudya miyezi iwiri mosadukiza asanabwererane. Koma ngati sangathe kutero, ayenera kudyetsa anthu osauka makumi asanu ndi limodzi; ndi cholinga chakuti muonetse chikhulupiriro mwa Mulungu ndi Mtumwi wake. Amenewa ndiwo malamulo amene adakhazikitsidwa ndi Mulungu. Ndipo kwa anthu osakhulupilira kuli chilango chowawa
